divs: Sighting DetailsBasically it was a three night ordeal and they came back on three sucessiveevenings. I knew them from before but it was locked in my memory, so I trustedthem eventhough being afraid and all the extreme strangeness..somehow I was alsoposessed by an other spirit thaat calmed me. I wrote it all down for five yearswhile remaining in contact. I am still in contact today but they arent puttingon as big of a show really, but have a feeling I might be seeing them again..maby finally get some pictures of a ufo . Ijust have this spirit guide thathas been a mentor and I have a feeling soon might be in for a few more surprisessince they often say stuff like get ready for contact and just sort of leadingme to believe maby soon..all the news on the history channel and stuff. Ifinally got a digital camera and hope to get something. Here is my story httpjeeze1999.00sf.comMark
trends: There has been one other sighting in Redwood valley
There were no other sightings in Redwood valley on or around January 20th 2003
